author: Adrian Devera Alonzo

text:
Nice!  I tried learning again today...are these notes similar to what you had for the intro?

C(Natural)B(natural)C B C D E E E(half note) F E D C B D D D  C

All the regular ones without parentheses are quarters.  And the C is always natural xD.

I hope I'm not too off >_>...
